title: Which of Batman's gadgets turn out to be close to realistic? Which of these already exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: His smoke bombs, that’s honestly about it… remember these little guys?  Welp this is the real life civilian version   That’s the most realistic thing that Batman carries, another candidate for these is the m18 smoke grenades
Easily the Batarang  The versatility of this weapon is greatly exaggerated but it is very much possible and actually something you can purchase at novelty shops.
